body_html: I was working on porting the control_flow_ops module from the Python API because the TF_NewWhile/TF_FinishWhile methods are described as experimental and subject to change. Is there any specific reason that I should avoid porting the Python API approach, other than the implementation overhead? Thanks!

body: I was working on porting the control_flow_ops module from the Python API because the TF_NewWhile/TF_FinishWhile methods are described as experimental and subject to change. Is there any specific reason that I should avoid porting the Python API approach, other than the implementation overhead? Thanks!
